summary: I am a retired assistant professor in development economics of Tilburg University with experience in implementing capacity building projects at universities in Latin America (Peru, Bolivia,Guatemala) and Africa (Rwanda) and in executing evaluation studies of development policy and projects in various developing countries. My objectives are to continue working (but not full time) in these fields of activity and economic research. Special areas of interest are:informal sector economimcs and SME, and macroaccounting (national and socio-economic and environmental accounting)
